description.en: ERC20 Token for the LOAD.network DeFi project. It introduces the concept of Forecast Sensitive Interest, which enables token holders to earn a higher percentage of daily dividends based on the accuracy of their price predictions. Phase 1 introduces the token through an ethical accumulation (only 25 eth OTC presale), Phase 2 introduces the FSI functionality, Phase 3 and beyond introduce further dApps, yield farming, and additional Forecasting pairs.
